The best game I've ever played

Gente = Rata.
VAC = Estúpido.
Esté juego es mierda, definitivamente mierda.
No gasten su dinero en esté juego, tengo VAC permanente por gente idiota que me voto de uso de hacks
Y los ratas de VAC ni hablar aceptan.

Un juego simple, del que se sacó muchísimo provecho con los mundiales y la gran cantidad de skins. Aún así, algunos servidores son una bazofia y deberían aumentar la precisión, que por algo es un shooter lowlife.

Quite Honestly, one of the best games i've ever played. Aside from hackers, Russians, some Indians, messed up shooting (for example : when you shoot someone in the head with an AWP and you see it going through their head but some'thow they don't die), and lastly the 5-year olds trying to carry us when it's really the opposite. 10/10

CSGO in a nutshell

Your team: 
-Russian teammates who do not understand a word of English
-no communication
-toxicity

Enemy team:
-teammates who speak English
-good communication
-positivity

Your team ends up losing the game 16-0.
